name: Tiny Forge
description:
NOTE:  Web build's audio cuts out after a few minutes into the game for some reason - you can use it to try the game out but the executable is recommended if you want to play through the entire game.

A blacksmithing game made in 1 week using the Love2D framework. Play little minigames to craft swords and work your way through different quests to try and become the world's best blacksmith!

Controls:

  • Spacebar for different minigame actions
  • Enter to dismiss dialogs and buy metals
  • Up and Down Arrow Keys to navigate menu
